Description: 

This mod adds A new World Called Hidden Village with, till now, 3 isles 
on one isle live the bloodmages the other is a isle full of mushrooms the 3th one isnt done yet but you will get there to do the final quest------------- 
-------------------------------------- 
A quest will be given tru a courier, when you enter any town (if he dont appears go into a house and go back to city), will lead you to the banned mere sit on the stool and wait for someone talk to you.It could take a while when hes dancing or stuff just wait. or stand up and sit again if he stoped dance. 
he will lead you to the village (near riverwood) and you need to talk with alcard. 
If hes in bed just wait till hes working. 
He will give you a quest to kill a cultist on mushroom island. 
To go over there go to little mushroom isle and find the altar. 


What does it add? 

- Some New Perks On Destruction Perk for Blood Mage 

-Destruction Spells are Now Leveling With You means more dmg+ per level 

-New Playable Race The Blood Mage: abilitys +50 healt / power: Controll blood = control a bloodet anything for 120 seconds( just makes them harmless or help you) 

-8 new spells based on bloodmage: 
Blood Aura/ blut aura: Incrases your life. Dual cast it for more life / costs life 
Blood Sight/ blut sicht : Lets you see anything that has blood / costs life to cast 
Blood Converting/ blut umwandlung : Converts life into Stamina and magica 
Blood Transfusion : Single fire Area absorb 
Bloodwall/ blutwall : Concentraitet fire Area absorb 
Blood ball Aura : Area absorb only affects enemies / costs life 
Blood absorb/ blut absaugen : Absorbs life overtime from an single actor 
Conjure blood devil : well nothing to say 

- A spell to call odaviing for much more then a few seconds even if u not have completet the quest and a spell to send him away 

- A spell to make odahviing land thx to Journeyman. Talk to odaving and change his skin via placing it in his inventory!! 

- A Quest line fully voice synchronized 
- A little village with merchants that have theyr own day with working and stuff 
- A sabrecat follower 
- A new Bloodmage robe with dechantable destruction damage fortyfy enchantments ( Forgable after ending the quest) 
- Bear follower 
- A Trasformation : Blood Deamon for you and your warlock follower that can be found in the village ( talk to her after finishing the quests she will have a dialog option that allows her transform when into battle after u told her to transorm she gets another dialog option that forbids her to transform )



Attention!! 
This moddiefies the original call dragon shout so he will stay longer if u shout too 
but it dont conflicts with the quest line
